sentence: Rivian incentives play into Georgia politics After the state of Georgia and local governments this month approved $1.5 billion in incentives for Rivian to build a 7,500-job, $5 billion electric vehicle plant east of Atlanta, former Sen. David Purdue criticized the deal, the Associated Press reported.
author: Randy Essex
title: One-time EV darling Rivian hit by report of Ford stock sale, Georgia governor's race fight
